Description:
Detects when an Okta end-user reports activity by their account as being potentially suspicious.

Author: kelnage
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Okta Suspicious Activity Reported by End-user
Query: sourcetype='okta-okta' eql select * from _source_ where eventtype = 'user.account.report_suspicious_activity_by_enduser'
